channel.title: Posts on Lenscas' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Lenscas' blog

item.title: Comments
item.description: Just a short post to tell that my blog has a comment section! ðŸŽ‰ Shout out to both utteranc and github for allowing me to add comments without cost. It is a GREAT hack that the guys over at utteranc made, and I love it. Anyway, that is all have a great day :)

item.title: F# and Godot part 1
item.description: In this part I will touch on why I chose F# instead of the many other languages that I know and could’ve used with godot. In addition it also goes over on how to set it up. Part 2 will go over how to do some basic things in Godot with F#, like how to emit signals. In part 3 we take a bit deeper dive into F# and use some of its features to extend one of Godot’s libraries so it becomes easier to use.

item.title: Hello_World!
item.description: I’m Lenscas, just a random developer wanting to have a place to put his thoughts on. As well as put updates for projects and maybe some other stuff. We will see :) Expect to see content about my (still heavily in development) card game and other stuff I end up working on. Currently planned (not in this order) : my thoughts on Quicksilver, the libraries I made for it and its sad demise a dive into using F# with Godot.
